tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Miti Shah is an exceptional chest doctor. Her knowledge and expertise in respiratory care is outstanding. She listens attentively, conducts thorough examinations, and provides clear explanations. Dr. Shah's compassionate approach and personalized treatment plans instill confidence in her patients. Her dedication to follow-up care ensures that patients receive ongoing support. I highly recommend Dr. Miti Shah for anyone seeking a chest doctor. She is an excellent healthcare professional who goes above and beyond to ensure the well-being of her patients.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My father was suffering from bronchiectasis from past 6 months. We had consulted with many doctors but we were not getting any results. Later we had searched on google and Found *** ** *** **** Pulmonolgist Doctor (Dr. Miti Shah). She had checked all the reports and asked my dad not to worry, You are absolutley fine and she has prescribed few medicine and finally we have got the good result. Really had a great conversation. God bless her. I would want to give more than 5 stars for this. And i would highly recommend to everyone if you are facing any chest problem or if you required general physician **** *** ** *** ** *** **** ****** ** *** *******
